QuestData.Title: Xylem's Asylum
QuestData.Description: Quite marvelous of you! A pleasure to observe. Much to study.$B$BOff you go now, retire to my tower. Joanna will get you situated. I shall open a portal for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the portal to Archmage Xylem's tower and seek out Joanna inside.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome! You seem to have survived the trials relatively unscathed. Good for you, love.$B$BYou look to have come with a purpose in mind as well. A question. Your thoughts are very loud, it's hard for me to not hear them.$B$BGo ahead then, hon. Ask away.
